Description of incident: On September 26, 2011, Hackensack University Medical Center became aware that a dishonest employee had accessed patient information prior to September 1, 2011.  A former employee working as a clerk took confidential patient files from an outpatient clinic.  The files contained names, Social Security numbers, addresses, dates of birth, driver's license numbers, health insurance cards, and other insurance information.  No medical records were taken.
